vote.title: Reappointment of Member to School Construction Bond Citizens’ Oversight Committee
vote.description: Resolved, That the Governing Board of the Los Angeles Unified School District ratifies the reappointment of Mr. Scott Pansky, representing the Los Angeles Area Chamber of Commerce, as a Member to the School Construction Bond Citizens’ Oversight Committee for a two-year term commencing on April 5, 2024. Mr. Pansky is not an employee, official, vendor, contractor, or consultant of the District.
